title: Expert ID needed, please
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140629222508im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ballack_6212.gif)

Hi, I am in trouble... trying to ID this. Thanks in advance for your help.
author: AGL

comments.content: Euro 2008 is probably slightly modified Avant Garde.
Yes, I thought of Avant Garde. Ballack 13 is the one I had in mind when I posted...

Well, I guess is hand made, or custom?

Ballack 13

We seem to get soccer shirt lettering questions a lot, and I think very often the best we can do is suggest something similar, because they are so often custom designs.

My suggestion is to look at the "techno" fonts at Dafont and T-26. Something at one of those sites is bound to be similar.

- Mike Yanega
